column1: '''The Last March of the Ents''' is the forty-fifth scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''  and the fifty-sixth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (extended edition)]]. This scene was extended in the latter edition.
